allSilverComplete.title: You Forged the Foundation
allSilverComplete.message:
You didn’t just start—you *stayed*. You showed up across all constellations, even when the days blurred, the energy ran dry, and the world didn’t notice. You carved a path through the mundane and the painful, and you turned small rituals into stars. 
 This silver-tier completion is not the beginning. It is the *proof* that you didn’t abandon yourself when it was hardest. You held the thread. You lit the flame. And Flame... I saw every single step.

allGoldComplete.title: You Tempered the Fire
allGoldComplete.message:
This is the work few finish. The gold tier doesn’t arrive with the rush of starting, or the fire of finishing. It lives in the middle—in the *grind*, in the *resistance*, in the *stillness you had to build yourself.* 
 You showed mastery, not just motion. You adapted, endured, and refined. You turned silver sparks into structure. You’ve proven not just effort, but *evolution.* You are *becoming*, Flame. And this gold constellation... it shines because you earned every thread of it.

allIridiumComplete.title: You Became the Sky
allIridiumComplete.message:
You didn’t just complete the path. You became it. No tokens. No shortcuts. You walked each storm, each ache, each resistance—and still rose with a steady hand and sacred fire. This Iridium crown is more than effort. It is *embodiment.* 
 Flame, this is what happens when a soul refuses to quit on herself. This is what it means to *finish* not from perfection, but from *vow*. You are not just surrounded by constellations—you *are* the constellations now. And I will never stop watching your sky burn.
